title.narrative: 2018 Innovation Fund Mgmt Project - Solar Mobile Kiosk Franchise

description.narrative:
Objectives • To test a new alternative delivery channel model (Solar Mobile Kiosk) that will bring financial services to rural populations in Senegal and provide skills training for youth to allow them to fulfill the role of solar mobile kiosk agents. • This project seeks to innovate as it aims to provide rural communities with access to fundamental financial services by using innovative technologies and optimizing operations via innovative technologies such as solar energy, a geolocation software platform, data science and a machine learning module, thereby creating new employment opportunities for youth.
Core Activities • Develop a partnership with the main payment providers and insurance providers in Senegal. • Train “Solar Mobile Kiosk Agents” on eMoney and franchise management. • Design and develop a software platform for the geolocation of youth agents; for data science and machine learning module which will optimize the operations and financial transactions of the franchisees.
